DOC.brief_summary: Forty six patient knee osteoarthritis randomly allocate two group : water-based exercise land-based exercise . Both receive strengthening exercise protocol lower limb muscle . A blind investigator ass patient immediately , 3 month 6 month follow intervention . The main outcome pain , function strength .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Land-based Water-based Exercises Knee Osteoarthritis : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Forty six patient knee osteoarthritis randomly allocate two group : water-based exercise land-based exercise . Both receive strengthening exercise protocol lower limb muscle . A blind investigator ass patient immediately , 3 month 6 month follow intervention . The main outcome pain , function , physical performance strength .
DOC.criteria: Moderate knee osteoarthritis ( grade 2 3 use KellgrenLawrence radiograph classification ) , diagnose base clinical radiological criterion American College Rheumatology No low limb spine musculoskeletal disorder Independent gait Body mass index 32 Minimum 4 point pain numeric rating scale climb descend stair activity Cognitive psychological disorder Neurological disorder History posttraumatic knee osteoarthritis Knee pain least 12 month Prior surgery low limb spine Fibromyalgia Rheumatoid arthritis Cardiovascular disease Participating exercise program receive treatment knee least 3 month
